summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a communication issue regarding a third party. Epstein expresses a desire not to send an email to the individual in question and mentions that their phone is off, indicating a need for further communication. The email contains a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is involved in an email exchange with Jeffrey Epstein regarding communication with a third party.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email expressing his communication preferences regarding a third party.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about a third party, indicating a social or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on September 23, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses a desire not to send an email to a third party whose phone is off.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
